title: cafter
author: cafter
created_time: October 31, 2023, 08:27:59 PMLast edit: October 31, 2023, 09:35:12 PM by cafter
content: Found this on youtube: Bitcoinica Theft with unusual transaction to Theymos.in video he says the stolen 40,000 BTC from mtgox are connected to theymos and bitcointalk.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: If you want people to play a random video you will need to include more context that what you have written here.Add some of your oerso Al opinion on the video and a snippet of what people should expect when they play it.This is not limited to when posting videos, but any external content like articles, social media posts etc.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: The video is not recently but was 8 years ago. In the video, he said theymos is the owner of Bitcointalk. The founder of bitcoin Satoshi Nakamoto is the owner of Bitcointalk while theymos is the admin.

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on October 31, 2023, 08:52:49 PMThe video is not recently but was 8 years ago. In the video, he said theymos is the owner of Bitcointalk. The founder of bitcoin Satoshi Nakamoto is the owner of Bitcointalk while theymos is the admin. Wrong, theymos is the sole owner of the domain name, Satoshi never even posted here with the founder account.@OP, while you are accusing people indirectly, why don't you put some effort and provide a few txids, blockchain evidence here instead of inviting us to watch a video which we can't figure anything out by watching it?

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: Quote from: digaran on October 31, 2023, 09:25:09 PMQuote from: _act_ on October 31, 2023, 08:52:49 PMThe video is not recently but was 8 years ago. In the video, he said theymos is the owner of Bitcointalk. The founder of bitcoin Satoshi Nakamoto is the owner of Bitcointalk while theymos is the admin. Wrong, theymos is the sole owner of the domain name, Satoshi never even posted here with the founder account.@OP, while you are accusing people indirectly, why don't you put some effort and provide a few txids, blockchain evidence here instead of inviting us to watch a video which we can't figure anything out by watching it?I am not accusing anyone I just shared the video,

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on October 31, 2023, 09:30:48 PMI am not accusing anyone I just shared the video, I know that your intention is to share the video that you have found. Some may already know it and some don't but you should add more to OP like your own opinion on how you think about the video and if you think agree with tthe video or not. When I read the title, I thought it was something else but after I checked, it was not what I think it is. In my opinion, the thread title is misleading if you ask me. Better add more info when you share something or atleast explain what it is.
